Watches Ronnie's video and engages in lighthearted laughter with him.
Grabs the DV cam from Ronnie, leading to a playful tug-of-war.
Supports Ronnie by affirming and commenting positively on the footage ('That's great').
Carefully examines video footage multiple times to uncover hidden details.
Analyzes video footage carefully by repeatedly scanning, freezing image, adjusting brightness, and using frame-by-frame advance to detect hidden details.
Initially intends to delete the tape impulsively but then decides to examine it more thoroughly.
Calls out to Ronnie urgently for help upon seeing something frightening on the TV.
Hides the incriminating tape and prepares cautiously after sensing danger.
Presses frame-by-frame advance button persistently to reveal important hidden details on the tape, showing patience and keen observation.
Recognizes the significance of what he sees and urgently calls Ronnie for help, showing awareness and attempt to take action despite interruption from external factors.
After no response from Ronnie and finding the cordless phone dead, he acts quickly by hiding the tape and preparing to investigate quietly, showing resourcefulness and caution.
Screams for help upon seeing Ronnie's body, tries to escape Giles's attack.
Throws his racketball trophy at Giles to defend himself.
Tries to reach the kite string boundary line despite being pursued and tripped.
Cautiously checks hallway and stairs before proceeding carefully.
Disables the microwave popcorn and notices Ronnie's body quickly.
Throws his trophy aggressively at Giles when surprised.
Bolts out the back door to escape, showing quick reaction and urgency.
Trips on a garden gnome deliberately placed as a trap; fails to see or avoid the trap.
Attempts to reach the kite string boundary line under pursuit, showing determination and awareness.
Fails to evade Giles' final grab of his ankle before crossing the boundary.
Struggles fiercely against Giles to protect Julie, showing concern and anger for her safety.
Appears defiant and hostile toward Giles by mumbling insults under duct tape, indicating resistance but no sincere friendliness in this moment.
Struggles physically and verbally against Giles despite being overpowered and restrained.
Attempts to escape and resist captivity but ultimately fails due to Giles' superior strength and control.
Hesitates to turn on the computer and type despite being told to do so.
Eventually complies with instructions to use the computer, showing some willingness to adapt.
Gestures to Ashley to warn her of Giles grabbing her, allowing her to defend herself.
Throws a computer monitor at Giles, initiating violence.
Uses a baseball bat to fight Giles in a desperate struggle.
Throws an LCD computer monitor hitting Giles unexpectedly, demonstrating quick thinking and surprising accuracy despite physical handicaps.
Uses a baseball bat as a cane to pull himself up and continues fighting despite injury and handicap.
Maintains balance after being jabbed in the face, showing physical resilience and determination.
Runs into Ashley and falls, losing situational awareness momentarily.
Effectively communicates non-verbally to warn Ashley behind her, showing presence of mind and alertness.
Despite being in pain and restrained, gives clear, helpful information about others’ locations and the situation.
Focuses on protecting and rescuing his family, instructs Ashley to act and follow his lead.
Actively searches for tools and weapons to defend and escape, showing initiative aimed at collective safety.
Struggles against bondage despite pain; tries to free himself from ankle bracelet.
Quickly thinks of a plan involving gathering weapons and a key secreted in a book.
Shows frustration by yelling but quickly moves on to problem-solving.
Uses a key to unlock the porch door quietly and prepares to signal Ashley to act.
Breaks the window by swinging a bat and calls out provocatively to Giles to draw his attention.
Glances back at Ashley to check on her safety before confrontation.
Finds hidden key behind a book, uses it to unlock porch door quietly.
Plans a distraction by smashing window and calling out to antagonist.
Fails to notice Giles approaching from behind and is overpowered quickly.
Shoves Giles back through the broken window to protect Ashley, asks if she is okay, and encourages her to stick to the plan.
Shares a smile with Ashley after helping her to her feet.
Engages Giles aggressively and fights back to protect himself and presumably others.
Fights back fiercely against Giles despite injury, attempts to defend himself using available objects.
Headbutts Giles to gain momentary advantage despite being grabbed.
Spots stereo speaker nearby and uses it as a weapon, hitting Giles.
Despite being stabbed, rips the letter opener from his own thigh and uses it skillfully to wound Giles.
Reactively fights back while being choked, demonstrating presence of mind and resilience.
Falls from roof but quickly recovers, grabbing a racketball racket to defend himself.
Sidearms the racket at Giles from a disadvantaged position, showing quick thinking and skill under pressure.
Throws racket to disarm Giles's attack, jumps off a roof into a pool to escape danger
Quietly enters the kitchen heavily armed but cautious, opts to use table knives and carries a pool leaf-skimming net for defense
Looks for others in the house with concern, asks 'Where's my mom?'
Engages in violent fight with Giles, grabbing a butcher knife and attacking.
Receives a hug from Julie after she saves him, showing he has friends who care about him.
Opens up honestly to counselor about his feelings regarding his father's survival, showing vulnerability and sincerity.
Shares a coherent and reflective account of a traumatic experience with emotional insight, recognizing his father's role in saving him.
Engages calmly in a counseling session, demonstrating self-awareness and ability to communicate his feelings clearly.
Kale shares a moment of quiet observation and banter with Ashley, showing comfort and connection as they watch Julie work.
Refers to his mom as 'whacked' and expresses skepticism about her intentions, suggesting a blunt but arguably honest attitude.
Engages Ashley in playful, trusting behavior (kissing, sharing opinions), indicating warmth in his close relationship.
Discarding binoculars and rejecting another stakeout, showing an avoidance of further engagement or concern over the situation.
Pulls Ashley back to the bed and initiates a kiss, but stops immediately when sensing something off-screen, demonstrating awareness and caution.
